title: Pixel 5 unable to verify credit card in Google Pay
content:
I'm trying to add my MasterCard to google pay and asked me to sign into my mobile banking app to verify. The normal process as usual. Once I sign in, it says that Mobile Banking Verification not available for my card. Which is weird because I never had this issue with my previous device, Huawei P20 Pro.

Called my bank and they said that my card is authorized and there is $0.00 charge on my card.
Google support wasn't helpful, just kept saying my card was added but needs to be verified and ask me to contact my bank.
